amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 5 printed in House Report 113-21 and offered as the Democratic Caucus proposal.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A005) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Van Hollen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Hollen amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 253 (Roll no. 87).
